channel.title: Forums not sending E-mail
channel.description:
I just made an account recently, and yesterday I forgot my password, so I went through the steps to have an e-mail sent to me. The only problem is, it never got sent. I pressed send/receive dozens of times waiting for it, and it still hasn't come. I don't get why it isn't sending me the e-mail for it. (I finally logged in now because I tried every password I've ever used, so yeah :| )
does anyone know why it won't send the e-mail?

item.title: Forums not sending E-mail
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
You probably put your email in wrong.

Read full topic
